name: R5-QuestionnaireResponse-R4-QuestionnaireResponse
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 QuestionnaireResponse into FHIR R4

element.display: A structured set of questions and their answers

target.display: A structured set of questions and their answers
target.comment: R5 `QuestionnaireResponse` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse`

element.display: The individual or device that received and recorded the answers

target.display: Person who received and recorded the answers
target.comment: R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.author` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.author`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.authored` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.authored`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.basedOn` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.basedOn`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.contained`

element.display: Encounter the questionnaire response is part of

target.comment: R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.encounter`

R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.id`

element.display: Business identifier for this set of answers

target.display: Unique id for this set of answers
target.comment: R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.identifier` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.identifier` - identifier changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1)

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.implicitRules`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer`

R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.id`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.item` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.item`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.value[x]` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.answer.value[x]` - value[x] has change due to type change: R5 `value[x]` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `value[x]`; value[x] has change due to type change: R5 `value[x]` `Quantity` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `value[x]`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.definition` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.definition`

R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.id`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.item` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.item`

element.display: Pointer to specific item from Questionnaire

target.display: Pointer to specific item from Questionnaire
target.comment: R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.linkId` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.linkId`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Name for group or question text

target.display: Name for group or question text
target.comment: R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.item.text`

R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.meta`

R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.partOf` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.partOf`

element.display: Canonical URL of Questionnaire being answered

target.comment: R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.questionnaire` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.questionnaire`

element.display: The individual or device that answered the questions

target.display: The person who answered the questions
target.comment: R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.source` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.source` - source has change due to type change: R5 `source` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `source`

R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/questionnaire-answers-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/questionnaire-answers-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.subject` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `QuestionnaireResponse.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `QuestionnaireResponse.text`
